name: The 'contained database authentication' database flag for Cloud SQL on the SQL Server instance is set to 'off'
query: { cloudSqlInstances( where: { engine: "sqlserver" cloudProvider: "gcp" OR: [ { dbFlags_NONE: { name: "contained database authentication" } } { dbFlags_SOME: { name: "contained database authentication" value: "on" } } ] } ) { ...AssetFragment }}
